document.bingtitle: Popeyes: they always fuck you at the drive-thru - Dave Cullen ...
document.webtitle: Popeyes: they always fuck you at the drive-thru - Dave Cullen - Open Salon
document.description: Fortunately, the one near me always gets my order ... They did throw in an extra order of potato ... ya'll are so lucky. every fast food restaurant in Fernandina ...
